dct_title_s: L'AMERIQVE autrement Le NOVVEAV MONDE et INDES OCCIDENTALES
dct_description_sm: 1676, with additions of "Partie de la grande Terre Australe" added (lower right) and pictorial cartouche of native and his canoe and net surrounds "Explication des Marques", and with "chez l'Autheur au coin de la r√ºe de Harlay, proche le Palais." California with 12 place names and with Mer de Californie named; Anien shown on mainland where coastline continues north and forms large bay. Explanatory text in North America, and many added place names throughout.
Par P. Du Val d'Abbeuille Geographe Ordinaire du Roy.
Wagner 425; Wheat 64; Tooley 20 (Plate 36) & 21; Leighly 45; BN Duval II B(4); BN Duval II C(11); UCB; Philip Burden, correspondence, 1995; Burden 311 (Plate312).
California with flat northern coast sloping up to east. Destroit d' Anien, Anien, and Terre de Iesso to the north.
